00023 #ifndef RLBSLOCMONITORAREAPOSITIONER_H
00024 #define RLBSLOCMONITORAREAPOSITIONER_H
00025 
00026 #include <lbspositioninfo.h>
00027 #include <lbsareainfo.h>
00028 #include "rlbslocmonitorsession.h"
00029 #include "lbslocmonitorserverdata.h"
00030 #include "clbslocmonitorptrholder.h"
00031 
00041 class RLbsLocMonitorAreaPositioner : public RSecureSubSessionBase
00042         {
00043 
00044 public:
00045 
00046         IMPORT_C RLbsLocMonitorAreaPositioner();
00047         IMPORT_C void OpenL(RLbsLocMonitorSession& aLocMonSession);
00048         IMPORT_C void Close();
00049 
00050         /* Called by the Location Server to report the last
00051          Position obtained from any of its PSYs that are not otherwise
00052          available to the Location Monitor. The position
00053          will be stored in a database.
00054          */
00055         IMPORT_C TInt SetLastKnownPosition(const TPositionInfoBase& aPosInfo) const;
00056         
00057         /* Retrieve the position last stored in the database */
00058     IMPORT_C void GetLastKnownPosition(TPositionInfoBase& aPosInfo,
00059                                          TRequestStatus& aStatus) const;
00060     
00061     /* Cancel a previous call to GetLastKnownPosition*/
00062     IMPORT_C TInt CancelGetLastKnownPosition() const;                 
00063 
00064         /* Returns in aPosInfo a position which had been previously stored 
00065         in association with "context information" that is bound to a 
00066         geographical area (e.g. Global Cell Id).
00067         
00068         Current context information will be sensed by the server and used
00069         to search for a position in the database. If found, the position 
00070         will be an approximation of the current position of the handset.
00071         If no position is found in the database for the current context
00072         information, the position last stored in the database is returned.
00073         
00074         The method returns in aAreaInfo a rough indication of how accurate the
00075         returned position is based on an estimation of the size of the
00076         geographical area covered by the sensed context information.
00077         */
00078         IMPORT_C void GetLastKnownPositionArea(TPositionInfoBase& aPosInfo,
00079                                                                  TPositionAreaInfoBase& aAreaInfo,
00080                                                                  TPosAreaReqParams& aParameters,
00081                                          TRequestStatus& aStatus) const;
00082 
00083     /* Cancel a call to GetLastKnownPositionArea */
00084     IMPORT_C TInt CancelGetLastKnownPositionArea() const;
00085 
00086                                                  
00087 protected:
00088 
00089         IMPORT_C virtual void ConstructL();
00090         IMPORT_C virtual void Destruct();
00091 
00092 private:
00093 
00096         CLbsLocMonitorPtrHolder* iPtrHolder;                                     
00097         };
00098         
00099 #endif // RLBSLOCMONITORAREAPOSITIONER_H
